name: Gail A. ZEPPA v. The ZONING BOARD OF REVIEW OF the TOWN OF SOUTH KINGSTOWN et al.
name_abbreviation: Zeppa v. Zoning Board of Review

parties: Gail A. ZEPPA v. The ZONING BOARD OF REVIEW OF the TOWN OF SOUTH KINGSTOWN et al.

opinions.text:
ORDER
Petition for Writ of Certiorari is denied without prejudice.

attorneys: Hogan & Hogan, Thomas S. Hogan, Donald J. Packer, East Providence, for plaintiff-respondent.
casebody.head_matter:
Gail A. ZEPPA v. The ZONING BOARD OF REVIEW OF the TOWN OF SOUTH KINGSTOWN et al.

Aug. 27, 1982.
Hogan & Hogan, Thomas S. Hogan, Donald J. Packer, East Providence, for plaintiff-respondent.
Robert B. Gates, for defendants-petitioners.
